QPopMenuItems.QPopMenuItem:
def Switch_Init(self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("duplicate.polygons") == 1: return True return False
def Switch_Execute(self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function Application.SetValue("Preferences.duplicate.polygons", not Switch_Init(self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets))
def Script_Execute(): #Don't rename this function #Weld selected points towards their common center Application.ApplyTopoOp("WeldPoints")

def Script_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") stri = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Top\")") eval(stri) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera ("","","", viewIndices[oView])

def Switch_Init(self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function State = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("Camera.orbitselected") == 1 return State
def Switch_Execute(self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("Camera.orbitselected") != 1: Application.SetValue("preferences.Camera.orbitselected", 1, "") else: Application.SetValue("preferences.Camera.orbitselected", 0, "")
def Script_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function #Weld selected points towards their common center Application.ApplyTopoOp("WeldPoints")

def Script_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") stri = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"User\")") eval(stri)

#The following code adds a menu item per light in the scene to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective light (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QPopMenu_Execute(self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function! self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the mneu after subsequent calls Lights = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "light", "", True) for oLight in Lights: oLightItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oLightItem.name = oLight.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets):
') Code += "	bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
" Code += "	bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue('preferences.Interaction.autoinspect')
" Code += "	if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("" + oLight.FullName + "");
" Code += ("	else: Application.SelectObj('" + oLight.FullName + "','','');") oLightItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oLightItem)

#The following code adds a menu item per existing camera to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective camera (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QPopMenu_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function! self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets):
') Code += ('	Application.SelectObj("'+ oCam.FullName + '", "", "")
') Code += ('	bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
') Code += ('	bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue("preferences.Interaction.autoinspect")
') Code += ('	if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("' + oCam.FullName + '.Camera",)') oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

def QPopMenu_Execute(self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets): #Don't rename this function!
self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Light", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: if Application.GetValue(oCam.FullName + ".light.Type") == 2: print (oCam.FullName + " is a spotlight") oCamItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets):\n\toVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )\n') Code+= ('\toView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")\n') Code += ('\toVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "\","' + oCam.FullName + '")\n')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QPopMenuItems, QPopMenus, QPopMenuSets):\n\toVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )\n') Code+= ('\toView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")\n') Code += ('\toVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "\","' + oCam.FullName + '")\n')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

QPopMenuDisplayContexts.QPopMenuDisplayContext: def QPopContext_Execute(SelInfo): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(Application.Selection) > 0): #Is something selected? oSelection = Application.Selection(0) if oSelection.Type == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True selType = oSelection.Type if ((selType == "edgeSubComponent") or (selType == "pntSubComponent") or (selType == "polySubComponent")): oParentObj = oSelection.Subcomponent.Parent3DObject if oParentObj.Type == "polymsh": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!
def QPopContext_Execute(SelInfo): #Don't rename this function return True
